verses.text_ar: ٱقْتَرَبَتِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ وَٱنشَقَّ ٱلْقَمَرُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: The hour drew nigh and the moon was rent in twain.

verses.text_ar: وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ ءَايَةً يُعْرِضُوا۟ وَيَقُولُوا۟ سِحْرٌ مُّسْتَمِرٌّ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And if they behold a portent they turn away and say: Prolonged illusion.

verses.text_ar: وَكَذَّبُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓا۟ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلُّ أَمْرٍ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
verses.text_en_pickthall: They denied (the Truth) and followed their own lusts. Yet everything will come to a decision

verses.text_ar: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَنۢبَآءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزْدَجَرٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And surely there hath come unto them news whereof the purport should deter,

verses.text_ar: حِكْمَةٌۢ بَـٰلِغَةٌ ۖ فَمَا تُغْنِ ٱلنُّذُرُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Effective wisdom; but warnings avail not.

verses.text_ar: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ ۘ يَوْمَ يَدْعُ ٱلدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَىْءٍ نُّكُرٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: So withdraw from them (O Muhammad) on the day when the Summoner summoneth unto a painful thing.

verses.text_ar: خُشَّعًا أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمْ جَرَادٌ مُّنتَشِرٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: With downcast eyes, they come forth from the graves as they were locusts spread abroad,

verses.text_ar: مُّهْطِعِينَ إِلَى ٱلدَّاعِ ۖ يَقُولُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا يَوْمٌ عَسِرٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Hastening toward the summoner; the disbelievers say: This is a hard day.

verses.text_ar: ۞ كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ فَكَذَّبُوا۟ عَبْدَنَا وَقَالُوا۟ مَجْنُونٌ وَٱزْدُجِرَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: The folk of Noah denied before them, yea, they denied Our slave and said: A madman; and he was repulsed.

verses.text_ar: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّى مَغْلُوبٌ فَٱنتَصِرْ
verses.text_en_pickthall: So he cried unto his Lord, saying: I am vanquished, so give help.

verses.text_ar: فَفَتَحْنَآ أَبْوَٰبَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَآءٍ مُّنْهَمِرٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Then opened We the gates of heaven with pouring water

verses.text_ar: وَفَجَّرْنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ عُيُونًا فَٱلْتَقَى ٱلْمَآءُ عَلَىٰٓ أَمْرٍ قَدْ قُدِرَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And caused the earth to gush forth springs, so that the waters met for a predestined purpose.

verses.text_ar: وَحَمَلْنَـٰهُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلْوَٰحٍ وَدُسُرٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And We carried him upon a thing of planks and nails,

verses.text_ar: تَجْرِى بِأَعْيُنِنَا جَزَآءً لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: That ran (upon the waters) in Our sight, as a reward for him who was rejected.

verses.text_ar: وَلَقَد تَّرَكْنَـٰهَآ ءَايَةً فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And verily We left it as a token; but is there any that remembereth?

verses.text_ar: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Then see how (dreadful) was My punishment after My warnings!

verses.text_ar: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And in truth We have made the Qur´an easy to remember; but is there any that remembereth?

verses.text_ar: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: (The tribe of) A´ad rejected warnings. Then how (dreadful) was My punishment after My warnings.

verses.text_ar: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ رِيحًا صَرْصَرًا فِى يَوْمِ نَحْسٍ مُّسْتَمِرٍّ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! We let loose on them a raging wind on a day of constant calamity,

verses.text_ar: تَنزِعُ ٱلنَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ مُّنقَعِرٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Sweeping men away as though they were uprooted trunks of palm-trees.

verses.text_ar: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Then see how (dreadful) was My punishment after My warnings!

verses.text_ar: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And in truth We have made the Qur´an easy to remember; but is there any that remembereth?

verses.text_ar: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: (The tribe of) Thamud rejected warnings

verses.text_ar: فَقَالُوٓا۟ أَبَشَرًا مِّنَّا وَٰحِدًا نَّتَّبِعُهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذًا لَّفِى ضَلَـٰلٍ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: For they said; Is it a mortal man, alone among us, that we are to follow? Then indeed we should fall into error and madness.

verses.text_ar: أَءُلْقِىَ ٱلذِّكْرُ عَلَيْهِ مِنۢ بَيْنِنَا بَلْ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Hath the remembrance been given unto him alone among us? Nay, but he is a rash liar.

verses.text_ar: سَيَعْلَمُونَ غَدًا مَّنِ ٱلْكَذَّابُ ٱلْأَشِرُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: (Unto their warner it was said): To-morrow they will know who is the rash liar.

verses.text_ar: إِنَّا مُرْسِلُوا۟ ٱلنَّاقَةِ فِتْنَةً لَّهُمْ فَٱرْتَقِبْهُمْ وَٱصْطَبِرْ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! We are sending the she-camel as a test for them; so watch them and have patience;

verses.text_ar: وَنَبِّئْهُمْ أَنَّ ٱلْمَآءَ قِسْمَةٌۢ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ كُلُّ شِرْبٍ مُّحْتَضَرٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And inform them that the water is to be shared between (her and) them. Every drinking will be witnessed.

verses.text_ar: فَنَادَوْا۟ صَاحِبَهُمْ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: But they call their comrade and he took and hamstrung (her).

verses.text_ar: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Then see how (dreadful) was My punishment after My warnings!

verses.text_ar: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَكَانُوا۟ كَهَشِيمِ ٱلْمُحْتَظِرِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! We sent upon them one Shout, and they became as the dry twigs (rejected by) the builder of a cattle-fold.

verses.text_ar: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And in truth We have made the Qur´an easy to remember; but is there any that remembereth?

verses.text_ar: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوطٍۭ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: The folk of Lot rejected warnings.

verses.text_ar: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حَاصِبًا إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ ۖ نَّجَّيْنَـٰهُم بِسَحَرٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! We sent a storm of stones upon them (all) save the family of Lot, whom We rescued in the last watch of the night,

verses.text_ar: نِّعْمَةً مِّنْ عِندِنَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى مَن شَكَرَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: As grace from Us. Thus We reward him who giveth thanks.

verses.text_ar: وَلَقَدْ أَنذَرَهُم بَطْشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوْا۟ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And he indeed had warned them of Our blow, but they did doubt the warnings.

verses.text_ar: وَلَقَدْ رَٰوَدُوهُ عَن ضَيْفِهِۦ فَطَمَسْنَآ أَعْيُنَهُمْ فَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: They even asked of him his guests for an ill purpose. Then We blinded their eyes (and said): Taste now My punishment after My warnings!

verses.text_ar: وَلَقَدْ صَبَّحَهُم بُكْرَةً عَذَابٌ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And in truth the punishment decreed befell them early in the morning.

verses.text_ar: فَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Now taste My punishment after My warnings!

verses.text_ar: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And in truth We have made the Qur´an easy to remember; but is there any that remembereth?

verses.text_ar: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَ ءَالَ فِرْعَوْنَ ٱلنُّذُرُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And warnings came in truth unto the house of Pharaoh

verses.text_ar: كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُمْ أَخْذَ عَزِيزٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Who denied Our revelations, every one. Therefore We grasped them with the grasp of the Mighty, the Powerful.

verses.text_ar: أَكُفَّارُكُمْ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكُمْ أَمْ لَكُم بَرَآءَةٌ فِى ٱلزُّبُرِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Are your disbelievers better than those, or have ye some immunity in the scriptures?

verses.text_ar: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ نَحْنُ جَمِيعٌ مُّنتَصِرٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Or say they: We are a host victorious?

verses.text_ar: سَيُهْزَمُ ٱلْجَمْعُ وَيُوَلُّونَ ٱلدُّبُرَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: The hosts will all be routed and will turn and flee.

verses.text_ar: بَلِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ مَوْعِدُهُمْ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدْهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Nay, but the Hour (of doom) is their appointed tryst, and the Hour will be more wretched and more bitter (than their earthly failure).

verses.text_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! the guilty are in error and madness.

verses.text_ar: يَوْمَ يُسْحَبُونَ فِى ٱلنَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ ذُوقُوا۟ مَسَّ سَقَرَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: On the day when they are dragged into the Fire upon their faces (it is said unto them): Feel the touch of hell.

verses.text_ar: إِنَّا كُلَّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقْنَـٰهُ بِقَدَرٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! We have created every thing by measure.

verses.text_ar: وَمَآ أَمْرُنَآ إِلَّا وَٰحِدَةٌ كَلَمْحٍۭ بِٱلْبَصَرِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And Our commandment is but one (commandment), as the twinkling of an eye.

verses.text_ar: وَلَقَدْ أَهْلَكْنَآ أَشْيَاعَكُمْ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And verily We have destroyed your fellows; but is there any that remembereth?

verses.text_ar: وَكُلُّ شَىْءٍ فَعَلُوهُ فِى ٱلزُّبُرِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And every thing they did is in the scriptures,

verses.text_ar: وَكُلُّ صَغِيرٍ وَكَبِيرٍ مُّسْتَطَرٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And every small and great thing is recorded.

verses.text_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَنَهَرٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! the righteous will dwell among gardens and rivers,

verses.text_ar: فِى مَقْعَدِ صِدْقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍۭ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Firmly established in the favour of a Mighty King.
